title: Simple E-Commerce Template
description: A modern clothing e-commerce website with responsive design and secure checkout.
fullDescription: Developed a fully functional e-commerce website for clothing, featuring a user-friendly interface, secure checkout, and a seamless shopping experience. The platform includes product categorization, search functionality, and responsive design for optimal performance across devices.

title: GSI Ascenseurs Website
description: Professional website for an elevator sales agency showcasing products and services.
fullDescription: Created a website for an agency specializing in elevator sales, showcasing products, services, and expertise in the industry. Designed with a professional and modern layout to highlight the agency’s offerings and ensure an informative user experience.

title: Arriach Travel Agency
description: A travel agency website highlighting destinations, services, and immersive travel experiences.
fullDescription: Developed a travel agency website showcasing destinations, services, and travel experiences. Designed with a visually appealing layout, the site highlights the agency’s offerings and expertise while ensuring a smooth and engaging user experience.

title: Estudy Platform
description: An online learning platform designed for students to access courses, materials, and track progress.
fullDescription: Developed a modern online education platform tailored for students to access courses, learning materials, and track their academic progress. Built with a clean UI and a responsive layout to ensure a seamless learning experience across devices.
